Orphapacket.Label: Isolated absence of thigh and lower leg with foot present

Synonyms.Synonym: Isolated congenital femoro-tibio-fibular intercalary transverse meromelia

TextSection.Contents: Congenital absence of thigh and lower leg with foot present is a rare non-syndromic intercalary limb reduction defect characterized by unilateral or bilateral absence of femoral and tibio-fibular components with the presence of intact foot elements.
